trait_realm_01_qi_info: Entry into cultivation, sensing and absorbing Qi.
trait_realm_02_foundation_info: Solidifying the Dao foundation, clearing the meridians.
trait_realm_03_core_info: Condensing the Golden Core, spiritual power takes form.
trait_realm_04_nascent_info: The infant emerges, divine sense expands greatly.
trait_realm_05_deity_info: Roaming the void, spiritual power undergoes metamorphosis.
trait_realm_06_infantchg_info: Reshaping the infant body, reaching a new height.
trait_realm_07_wending_info: At the peak of the Dao, glimpsing the Extreme Realm.
trait_realm_08_kuinie_info: Gazing into the gates of Nirvana, mind becomes settled.
trait_realm_09_jingnie_info: Nirvana fire cleanses the body, pure and stainless.
trait_realm_10_suinie_info: Breaking and then rebuilding, rebirth through Nirvana.
trait_realm_11_kongnie_info: Seeing the void nature, Nirvana without form.
trait_realm_12_kongling_info: The mind is clear and bright, harmonizing with the Dao.
trait_realm_13_kongxuan_info: Mysterious and profound, the gate to all wonders.
trait_realm_14_gtianzun_info: The ultimate Celestial, ruling over ten thousand worlds.
trait_realm_15_half_tatian_info: Above Celestials, starting the Nine Bridges of Heaven Trampling.
trait_realm_16_tatian_info: Trampling the heavens, ultimate perfection of the Dao.
trait_ancient_01_star_info: The Ancient God body begins to open.
trait_ancient_05_star_info: Strength shakes the mountains and seas.
trait_ancient_06_star_info: Divine sense becomes like an abyss.
trait_ancient_09_star_info: The majesty of the Ancient God descends.
trait_ancient_10_star_info: Returning to the ancestor as a Sovereign.
trait_attr_01_metal_info: Sharp and firm, the essence of slaughter.
trait_attr_02_wood_info: Growth and extension, the essence of vitality.
trait_attr_03_water_info: Soft and yielding, the essence of moisture.
trait_attr_04_fire_info: Blazing and bright, the essence of heat.
trait_attr_05_earth_info: Thick and carrying, the essence of transformation.
trait_inherit_04_tusi_info: The secret arts of the Tu Si lineage.
trait_path_01_demonic_info: Seek the Dao through demons, defying the heavens.
trait_path_02_immortal_info: Gain longevity, following the flow of nature.
trait_path_03_beast_info: Using the beast body to merge with heaven and earth.
trait_path_04_ancient_info: Inherit the Ancient God way, forge an immortal body.
trait_intent_02_angel_info: Guardian: Area Heal (10) + Damage reduction scales with allies.
trait_intent_03_qianhuan_info: Illusion: +5% DMG per hit (stacks to 5, 5s duration), +15% Base Accuracy.
trait_intent_04_killing_info: Battle-Hungry: +10% Final DMG; stacking kills. Decays 1/s after 10s out of combat.
trait_intent_05_reverse_info: Reversal: Clears 1 debuff every 5s and grants +20% ATK for 5s.
trait_intent_06_life_death_info: Life-Death: +20% Max HP; 40% DMG reduction + 30% Lifesteal during combat.
trait_intent_07_reincarnation_info: Protection: Passive fatal damage immunity and full heal (300 Year CD).
trait_intent_08_chaos_info: Chaos: 15% chance for 300% DMG or 10% self-heal when entering combat.
trait_intent_01_extreme_info: Instant execution on targets of same/lower realm (Cannot reach Soul Transformation).
trait_divine_02_weiya_info: Immobilizes enemy cultivators if they are 1 full realm lower (no effect on Ancient Gods).
trait_divine_01_baonuzhibian_info: Instantly heal 60% HP, +150% ATK for 60s; Costs 150 years of lifespan.
trait_divine_04_wanjianguizong_info: Summon a sword storm that causes Bleed.
trait_divine_05_xuankongpo_info: Single target attack with randomized damage.
trait_divine_06_zhenkongquan_info: Attacks 6 tiles ahead, knockback 2 tiles with Slow effect.
trait_divine_07_jiuyinbaiguzhao_info: Melee strike; executes if target <15% HP and applies Anti-Heal.
trait_divine_09_jianzhan_info: Summons a celestial sword for a devastating overhead strike.
trait_art_01_missile_info: Refines vengeful souls to deal high Dark burst damage and prevent healing.
trait_art_02_ascension_info: Burns Origin Power to temporarily boost realm; strengthens ATK/DEF and terrifies low-realm enemies.
trait_art_03_slash_info: Becomes an afterimage dealing high-speed slashes; immune to targeting and heals from damage dealt.
trait_art_04_quake_info: Injects Origin Power to cause an earthquake, stunning units and devastating buildings.
trait_art_05_waves_info: Summons waves of black demonic power that knock back enemies and deal increasing damage.
trait_art_06_convert_info: Karma conversion: deals burst damage and converts it to healing for self/allies while clearing debuffs.
trait_art_07_palm_info: A giant golden palm suppresses an area, destroying projectiles and dealing True Damage.
trait_art_08_breaker_info: Concentrated Origin Power that pierces armor; significantly weakens enemy cultivators' attributes.
trait_art_09_shield_info: Visible protective aura that reduces damage, reflects melee attacks, and grants CC immunity.
trait_art_10_link_info: Links souls with an ally to share damage; shared fate, life and death.
trait_test_lingli_5000_info: Instantly gain 5000 Spirit Power and remove this trait.
trait_test_lingli_10000_info: Instantly gain 10000 Spirit Power and remove this trait.
trait_test_yuanli_5000_info: Instantly gain 5000 Origin Power and remove this trait.
trait_test_yuanli_10000_info: Instantly gain 10000 Origin Power and remove this trait.
trait_test_nieli_5000_info: Instantly gain 5000 Nirvana Power and remove this trait.
trait_test_nieli_10000_info: Instantly gain 10000 Nirvana Power and remove this trait.
trait_test_heaven_trial_info: Sets unit to peak Illumination, clears tribulation cooldowns, and triggers the next system job.
row_possession_taken_info: Indicates if this unit has been possessed.
row_tianyun_count_info: Total times influenced by Tian Yunzi (Boon or Backlash).
row_reinc_count_info: Total reincarnations and past life info.
row_previous_life_info: Original info before possession (Click for details).
row_tianjiu_bridge_info: Progress on the 9 bridges of Heaven Trampling.
tab_mentorship_description: Displays Grandmaster, Master, Peers, and Disciples
row_next_break_req_info: Shows remaining power needed to breakthrough. Displays 'Ready' if met or 'Peak' if maxed.
xn_treasure_hunfan_description: An ancient flag used to capture and suppress spirits.
xn_treasure_qingtong_jian_description: A sword with ancient aura; sharpness hidden within simplicity.
xn_treasure_zijin_hulu_description: Can contain all things; grows stronger through refinement.
xn_treasure_pangu_fu_description: A tool to split mountains; heavy as the seas.
xn_treasure_qingguang_dun_description: Protective light that guards against blades and spells.
xn_treasure_tianni_zhu_description: A bead that defies the heavens; Void-Extermination rank.
xn_treasure_xianyu_baota_description: Exquisite pagoda with layers of sealing. Void-Extermination rank.
xn_treasure_mieshen_mao_description: A tip that pierces the soul. Void-Extermination rank.
xn_treasure_liguang_gong_description: Drawn like a full moon, arrow flies like a star. Void-Extermination rank.
xn_treasure_xiuxing_zhixin_description: Heart of a star, nurturing all things. Void-Extermination rank.
xn_treasure_desc_hunfan: Soul Sect treasure containing a billion souls. Its wave brings ghostly cries and blots out the sun.
xn_treasure_desc_qingtong_jian: An ancient sword with rust but peerless sharpness. Runes allow breaking restrictions and teleportation.
xn_treasure_desc_zijin_hulu: Contains a spatial rift. Can capture living beings and nurture pills via spiritual energy.
xn_treasure_desc_pangu_fu: Heavy treasure of extreme power. One swing shatters mountains; requires immense physical strength.
xn_treasure_desc_qingguang_dun: Defensive treasure emitting cyan light. Creates an indestructible barrier against divine arts.
xn_treasure_desc_tianni_zhu: Defies fate, containing a five-element space that alters time. The key to Heaven Trampling.
xn_treasure_desc_xianyu_baota: Made of top-grade jade. Can suppress enemies within or serve as an ultimate shield.
xn_treasure_desc_mieshen_mao: Ancient God companion weapon. Its thrust shatters the stars and pierces the Nascent Soul.
xn_treasure_desc_liguang_gong: Legendary bow of Li Guang. The arrow will not return until it drinks blood.
xn_treasure_desc_xiuxing_zhixin: The core of a cultivation star. Allows the user to utilize the entire star's power against enemies.
stats_icon_xn_xiuwei_desc: The key to breaking through to higher realms.
stats_icon_xn_lingli_desc: Spiritual energy absorbed from heaven and earth.
stats_icon_xn_yuanli_desc: Origin power converted from Immortal Jades.
stats_icon_xn_nieli_desc: The power derived from Origin Laws.
btn_xn_aura_toggle_desc: Shows Qi values on town and nation banners.
btn_xn_aura_add_brush_desc: Click on cities to randomly add or remove Qi.
btn_xn_xiuzhenguo_toggle_desc: Shows Cultivation Rank on kingdom banners based on the power of its cultivators.
btn_xn_place_ruins_desc: Places a ruin for cultivators to explore for treasures.
btn_xn_manual_gc_desc: Click if lagging to release memory and clear logs.
ranking_legend_desc: Left: View/Generate; Right: Regenerate (Requires API Key).
btn_xn_search_units_desc: Search for units by name (configure in settings).
row_xn_kingdom_cultivation_level_info: Determined by the number/realm of cultivators; affects training speed and expansion.
row_xn_kingdom_aura_sum_info: Sum of Qi across all cities in the kingdom.
row_xn_kingdom_cultivators_info: Distribution of cultivators in the kingdom.
row_xn_kingdom_ancients_info: Distribution of Ancient Gods in the kingdom.
row_xn_kingdom_beasts_info: Distribution of Demonic Beasts in the kingdom.
tip_xn_ambition: Accumulated value for Tian Yunzi. High values spawn clones; 10k triggers a world massacre.
btn_xn_add_ambition_desc: Adds value to Tian Yunzi's ambition. Set to 0 to clear.
xn_config_city_aura_max Description: Random upper limit for city Qi. Default: 10000.
xn_config_enable_animation Description: Toggles special cultivation effects and animations.
xn_config_enable_titles Description: Toggles display of cultivation titles above units.
xn_config_enable_tianyunzi_spawn Descrip: Disables Tian Yunzi and his clones.
xn_config_enable_xiuzhenguo_suppress Des: Toggles special rules for occupation between cultivation nations.
xn_config_enable_ancient_beast_level_lim: Prevents Ancient Gods/Beasts from becoming too overpowered.
xn_config_enable_auto_join_army Descript: High-realm cultivators will automatically join the army.
xn_config_enable_building_protection Des: Prevents normal buildings from being destroyed (excluding ruins).
xn_config_enable_xiuzhenguo_aura_limit D: Balances gameplay by limiting total national Qi. Recommended: ON.
xn_config_skin_tone_color Description: Select skin color for the brush tool (0-15).
xn_config_enable_mc_select_sfx Descripti: Plays sound effects when selecting units.
xn_config_enable_deepseek_textgen Descri: Uses DeepSeek to improve notification text.
xn_config_custom_ai_api_key Description: Enter your own API key for unlimited AI features.
xn_config_custom_ai_url Description: Custom AI endpoint (leaves blank for default DeepSeek).
xn_config_dashou_behavior Description: Sets the behavior of all Enforcers.
btn_xn_control_dashou_desc: Apply current behavior settings to all Enforcers.
btn_xn_skin_tone_brush_desc: Changes the skin color of units based on mod settings.
btn_xn_skin_tone_brush_description: Use the brush to change unit skin color.
btn_xn_servant_brush_desc: Brush: 1st click is Master, 2nd is Slave. Sets 5-year contract.
btn_xn_master_apprentice_brush_desc: Brush: Highest realm becomes Master. Limits apply to disciple count.
btn_xn_possession_brush_desc: Brush: 1st click is Soul, 2nd is Target. Success depends on mod mechanics.
btn_xn_reincarnation_brush_desc: Instantly kills a unit and forces 100% reincarnation.
btn_xn_main_character_brush_desc: Grant/Remove protagonist status. Only one protagonist allowed.
btn_xn_tournament_desc: Starts a tournament for the strongest units in an arena.
btn_xn_tournament_history_desc: View records of past tournament winners summarized by AI.
btn_xn_newbie_guide_desc: Opens the Renegade Immortal mod tutorial.
xn_guide_welcome: Welcome to RI Mod! Press Esc to exit guide.
xn_guide_aura: Qi Plate: Displays city energy levels.
xn_guide_xiuzhenguo: Nation Plate: Shows kingdom cultivation rank.
xn_guide_ruins: Ruins: Cultivators explore these for artifacts.
xn_guide_ranking: Ranking: See who is the strongest.
xn_guide_search: Search: Find units by specific names.
xn_guide_tournament: Tournaments: Set up the arena and start brackets.
xn_guide_cfg_aura: Settings-Qi: Configure Qi caps and refresh rates.
xn_guide_cfg_fav: Settings-Fav: Auto-favorite units reaching certain realms.
xn_guide_cfg_tianyun: Settings-Tian Yun: Years between sermon checks.
xn_guide_cfg_ambition: Settings-Ambition: Sets ambition gain per click.
xn_guide_cfg_ai: Settings-AI: Configure Voice and API settings.
xn_guide_end: Explore the rest! Check mod settings for API configs.
kingdom_trait_xn_fanjie_info: This kingdom belongs to the mortal realm. Qi has no effect, and citizens cannot condense Spirit Roots.
